nodes.text: The Master of the Sith Temple was a Sith rank within the Lost Tribe of Sith on the planet Kesh. It was held by the Sith who was tasked with running the Sith Temple on Kesh. By 41.5 ABY, that mantle was held by Sith Lord Takaris Yur, and he retained the title even after his ascension to High Lord in 44 ABY.
